description: The notification will be generated whenever an error
is detected during node discovery.

event.Summary: Error detected during node discovery in $v1 mode

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD APEMS-MIB::apEMSDiscoveryFailure APEMS-MIB::apEMSDiscoveryMode i 0 APEMS-MIB::apEMSNodeID s EXAMPLE APEMS-MIB::apEMSStartTime s EXAMPLE APEMS-MIB::apEMSDateTime s EXAMPLE APEMS-MIB::apEMSUser s EXAMPLE

description: The discovery mode
variables.name: APEMS-MIB::apEMSDiscoveryMode

description: The identifier for a Net-Net EMS node. This is the
identifier that appears on the navigation tree in
the Active Configuration area and on the discovery
table in the Host Name/IP Address column
variables.name: APEMS-MIB::apEMSNodeID

description: Time as configured at the Net-Net EMS server when
an event occurs.

description: Time as configured at the Net-Net EMS server when an
event completes.
variables.name: APEMS-MIB::apEMSDateTime

description: The user initiating the function.
If the function was initiated by the Net-Net EMS
application automatically, the
user will be system.
variables.name: APEMS-MIB::apEMSUser

description: The notification will be generated whenever an save
configuration request initiated by Net-Net EMS fails.

event.Summary: Net-Net EMS save configuration request failed
